add_libc_unittest(
  utils_test
  SUITE
    libc_string_unittests
  SRCS
    address_test.cpp
    elements_test.cpp
    memory_access_test.cpp
    utils_test.cpp
  COMPILE_OPTIONS
    ${LIBC_COMPILE_OPTIONS_NATIVE}
    -ffreestanding
  DEPENDS
    libc.src.string.memory_utils.memory_utils
    libc.src.__support.CPP.array
    libc.src.__support.CPP.array_ref
)
